Name: Amoxicillin (Amoxil)
Dosage: Take 4 capsules by mouth 1 hour before an appointment.
Usage: Treats various bacterial infections (e.g., ear infections, strep throat, pneumonia, skin infections).
Used as prophylaxis to prevent bacterial endocarditis in certain at-risk individuals undergoing dental or surgical procedures (as indicated by the specific dosage instructions).

Uncommon Side Effects: Severe allergic reactions (e.g., hives, difficulty breathing, swelling of face, lips, tongue, or throat)
Severe watery or bloody diarrhea (Clostridioides difficile-associated diarrhea)
Liver problems (e.g., yellowing of skin or eyes)
